title: FPS Drops Throughout Game
body:
Hello, 

I am running an R9 280 graphics card, overclocked, and I am getting a steady drop in FPS throughout the game. I will start around 400 FPS (Vert Sync and AA off) or 60 FPS (V-Sync and AA on) but by the end of the game its 200 FPS and 30 FPS respectively. The card is still before its temperature throttle recording in at a max temperature of 71 or so. I was wondering if there was a reason I was seeing a drop of almost half of my frames as I would like to be able to play with V-Sync and AA on. 

Drivers and league are completely updated and other games on my PC seem to run fine reaching 60 or so FPS on ultra consistently it just seems to be LoL that has the issues. 

Thanks! {{champion:99}}

replies.body: Is the card at a stock overclock or did you overclock it past its factory settings?

Custom Overclock using MSI Afterburner. Can handle gaming on something like Civilization VI or Fallout 4 for hours on end with no problem but can't seem to get through a league game without massive drop.

Just to ensure this isn't caused by your custom overclock, I'd like you to temporarily revert your card to stock clock. League can sometimes encounter issues with overclocked hardawre.

Let me know if this caused any change in-game for you.
I know it's a couple days later, sorry I was out of town, but on stock settings it does the exact same thing. Not sure what's up.

I looked into this issue further and it seems a recent batch of Windows 10 updates pushed out a re-enable for the Windows Game Bar feature. This feature has caused some FPS issues in the past, so I'd be interested to see if your issue was resolved after [**disabling the Game Bar**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if this helped!
I made sure that it was turned off and still no luck unfortunately!

Damn, I was hoping that would fix this.. :/

At this point, it would be a good idea to run some system logs with our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach those logs to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

One of our tech specialists will be able to work closely with you to resolve this after pinpointing the cause. Let me know if you run into issues submitting that ticket.
